identity.name: E1_WARRANTY_PORTAL
identity.core_philosophy: Trust through Precision. The interface should feel as reliable as a Swiss bank vault and as simple as a paper receipt.

usage.headings: Manrope, font-semibold, tracking-tight. Use for page titles and major section headers.
usage.body: Manrope, font-normal, leading-relaxed. Use for general text.
usage.data_display: JetBrains Mono, font-medium. CRITICAL: Use for Serial Numbers, Asset Tags, and Dates. This reinforces the 'technical' nature of the data.
usage.hero_input: Manrope, font-light, text-4xl or text-5xl. The input should feel massive.

accent.name: Trust Blue
accent.description: A deep, intense blue. Use sparingly for primary actions (Buttons, Active States). NEVER use as a background for large areas.

public_search.name: The Monolith
public_search.structure: Centered, single-column layout. The search bar is the hero. No distractions.

warranty_result.name: The Receipt
warranty_result.structure: A4-proportioned card centered on screen. Looks like a physical document.
warranty_result.details: Use a 'torn paper' or 'shadow-lg' effect to separate it from the background. High contrast data pairs (Label: Value).

admin_dashboard.name: The Control Grid
admin_dashboard.structure: Dense, information-rich. Use 'gap-px' with a background color to create grid lines between white cells.
admin_dashboard.tables: Zebra striping is BANNED. Use hover-row highlighting and 1px borders.

buttons.primary: bg-accent text-white rounded-md px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] rounded-xl p-6

inputs.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-slate-900 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent/20 focus:border-accent transition-all placeholder:text-slate-400

status_badge.style: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium border

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'noise' texture on the page background (opacity 0.02) to prevent the white from feeling sterile.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'diffuse' shadows. Large blur radius, low opacity. e.g., shadow-[0_20px_50px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)].
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons should have a subtle 'click' scale effect. Inputs should glow gently on focus.

landing_hero.usage: Use as a subtle background image with a heavy white overlay (90% opacity) or as a side image in a split layout.

security_icon.usage: Use for the 'Secure/Verified' success state or login page background.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. FORCE LIGHT MODE: In `tailwind.config.js`, ensure `darkMode` is set to 'class' but NEVER toggle the class to 'dark'. Hardcode the background to white/slate-50.
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'Manrope' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in `index.css`.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: Override the default 'radius' to '0.5rem' (8px) or '0.75rem' (12px) for a softer look. Set the 'primary' color to Slate-900, not black.
4. PDF EXPORT: Use `react-to-print` or `jspdf` for the warranty report. Style the print view to look exactly like the 'Receipt' card.
5. PUBLIC SEARCH: This is the most important page. Do not make it boring. Use the 'Monolith' layout. The input field should be the star of the show.
6. ADMIN BRANDING: Create a Context or Hook to allow dynamic injection of the 'Accent' color. Use CSS variables (`--accent`) for this so it can be changed at runtime.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
